title: 智能手表 Pro
content: 智能手表 Pro 是一款高端智能穿戴设备，支持心率监测、运动追踪、消息提醒等功能。采用AMOLED高清显示屏，续航时间长达7天。支持iOS和Android系统。

title: 无线蓝牙耳机
content: 无线蓝牙耳机采用主动降噪技术，提供沉浸式音乐体验。续航时间6小时，配合充电盒可达24小时。支持快速充电，10分钟充电可使用2小时。

title: Smart Watch Pro
content: Smart Watch Pro is a premium smart wearable device with heart rate monitoring, fitness tracking, and message notifications. Features AMOLED HD display with 7-day battery life. Compatible with iOS and Android.

title: Wireless Bluetooth Earbuds
content: Wireless Bluetooth earbuds feature active noise cancellation for immersive music experience. 6-hour battery life, up to 24 hours with charging case. Fast charging support - 10 minutes charge for 2 hours use.

title: 便携式充电宝
content: 20000mAh大容量便携式充电宝，支持双向快充。可为手机充电4-5次，支持多种设备。内置安全保护，过充、过放、短路保护。

title: Portable Power Bank
content: 20000mAh high-capacity portable power bank with bidirectional fast charging. Can charge phones 4-5 times, supports multiple devices. Built-in safety protection against overcharge, over-discharge, and short circuit.
